name: Network Optimization
description: Network and storage optimization tool for Proxmox VE. Configures BBR TCP congestion control, connection tracking for 10 users/10 applications, and SSD write cache optimization for 384GB RAM systems.

notes.text: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please run the command below **only** in the Proxmox VE Shell. This script is intended for managing or enhancing the host system directly.
üéØ This script offers 3 optimization modes: Network only, SSD Write Cache only, or All optimizations.

🌐 Network Optimization (10 users, 10 applications): • BBR TCP congestion control for improved throughput • Fair Queue (fq) queueing discipline • Connection tracking max: 256K connections • Connection tracking buckets: 65K (max/4) for efficient hash table

💾 SSD Write Cache Optimization (384GB RAM): • dirty_background_bytes: 256MB (start background flush) • dirty_bytes: 1GB (force flush threshold) • dirty_expire_centisecs: 10 seconds (flush old data) • dirty_writeback_centisecs: 1 second (check interval)
⚠️ Network settings are optimized for 10 concurrent users and 10 applications.
⚠️ SSD write cache settings are optimized for systems with 384GB RAM. Adjust if your system has different specifications.
💡 Check dirty pages: sysctl vm.dirty_background_bytes vm.dirty_bytes
